description: The latest phase of the Station Gateway Project to remodel the area near York Railway Station gets under way.
title: York Station: Roads to close and bus stops to move
title_page: York Station: Roads to close and bus stops to move - BBC News
maintext:
The next phase of an upgrade to the area around York Railway Station has begun with users warned about road closures and the relocation of bus stops.
City of York Council has released a new image which shows the progress of the Â£25m Station Gateway Project, including a new paved recreation area and cycle paths.
From 10 March, four bus stops on the city walls side of Station Road will be moved down the road, external, the council said, with lane closures on Blossom Street to remain in place until 12 April.
The authority said Network Rail's long-stay car park would also be closed permanently from 23.59 GMT on 14 March to allow for work to begin on a new car park.
